ADC.notes: Logical indices for 8-bit: Vin(8),D0-D7(0-7). Default bits=8

AnalogSwitch.notes: Logical indices: 0=Input, 1=Output, 2=Control. CMOS analog switch, can pass analog or digital signals

And Gate.notes: Logical indices: 0=Input_A, 1=Input_B, 2=Output. Variable input count in simulator (default 2). DIP-14 package, using only first gate

CC2.description: Custom Current Conveyor II (Analog Building Block)
CC2.notes: Logical indices: X(0),Y(1),Z(2). Specialized analog circuit

ComparatorReal.notes: Logical indices: 0=IN+, 1=IN-, 2=OUT. CompositeElm models internal circuit behavior

CustomCompositeChip.notes: Variable configuration based on user subcircuit definition

CustomCompositeReal.notes: Variable pin count based on user subcircuit definition. Extends CompositeElm for custom circuits

CustomLogic.description: Programmable Logic Device for Custom Logic Functions
CustomLogic.notes: Variable pins based on configuration. Generic PLD mapping

CustomTransformer.notes: Variable pin count based on number of windings/taps. Logical indices map to winding nodes sequentially

DAC.notes: Logical indices for 8-bit: D0-D7(0-7),Vout(8),V+(9). Default bits=8

D Flip Flop.description: Dual D-Type Flip-Flop with Set and Reset (using IC #1 only)
D Flip Flop.notes: Logical indices: 0=D,1=Q,2=Q̄,3=CLK,4=R(optional),5=S(optional). Maps to first flip-flop only

DarlingtonReal.notes: Logical indices: 0=Base, 1=Collector, 2=Emitter. CompositeElm models two-transistor configuration

DeMultiplexer.notes: Logical indices: Q0-Q7(0-7),INPUT(8),S0-S2(9-11). Default 2 select bits

DecimalDisplay.notes: Logical indices for 4-bit BCD: I0-I3(0-3). Displays 0-9 based on BCD input

FullAdder.description: 4-Bit Binary Full Adder with Fast Carry

HalfAdder.description: Quad 2-Input XOR Gate (one gate for sum) + AND gate (separate IC needed for carry)
HalfAdder.notes: Logical indices: 0=S(sum output),1=C(carry output),2=A,3=B. Requires external AND gate for carry

JKFlipFlop.description: Dual JK Flip-Flop with Clear (using IC #1 only)
JKFlipFlop.notes: Logical indices: 0=J,1=CLK,2=K,3=Q,4=Q̄,5=R(optional). Maps to first flip-flop

JfetN.notes: Logical indices: 0=Gate, 1=Source, 2=Drain. Junction FET, TO-92 package. Used for high input impedance buffers. Also works: J201, MPF102

Latch.notes: Logical indices for 8-bit: I0-I7(0-7),O0-O7(8-15),LE(16). Default bits=8

MBBSwitch.notes: Logical indices: 0=Common, 1=Terminal_A, 2=Terminal_B. Mechanical switch - not an IC

Mosfet.notes: Logical indices: 0=Gate, 1=Source, 2=Drain, (3=Body optional). Standard MOSFET component in simulator

Monostable.notes: Logical indices: CLK(0),Q(1),Q̄(2). External R and C required

MosfetN.notes: Logical indices: 0=Gate, 1=Source, 2=Drain, (3=Body optional). Discrete 3-pin MOSFET, TO-92 package. Body terminal typically not brought out. Also works: BS170, IRF540N (power)

MosfetP.notes: Logical indices: 0=Gate, 1=Source, 2=Drain, (3=Body optional). Discrete 3-pin MOSFET, TO-92 package. Complementary to 2N7000. Also works: IRF9540N (power)

Multiplexer.notes: Logical indices: I0-I7(0-7),S0-S2(8-10),Q(11). 3 select bits for 8:1 mux

Nand Gate.notes: Logical indices: 0=Input_A, 1=Input_B, 2=Output. Variable input count in simulator (default 2). DIP-14 package, using only first gate

Nor Gate.notes: Logical indices: 0=Input_A, 1=Input_B, 2=Output. Variable input count in simulator (default 2). DIP-14 package, using only first gate

OTAReal.description: Dual Operational Transconductance Amplifier (using OTA #1 only)
OTAReal.notes: Logical indices: 0=IN-, 1=IN+, 2=OUT, 3=AMP_BIAS, 4=IABC. Uses first OTA only

OpAmpReal.description: General Purpose Op-Amp with internal transistor-level model
OpAmpReal.notes: Logical indices: 0=IN-, 1=IN+, 2=OUT, 3=V+, 4=V-. CompositeElm models 741 internal circuit

OptocouplerReal.notes: Logical indices: 0=LED_Anode, 1=LED_Cathode, 2=Collector, 3=Emitter. Isolates input from output

Or Gate.notes: Logical indices: 0=Input_A, 1=Input_B, 2=Output. Variable input count in simulator (default 2). DIP-14 package, using only first gate

PhaseComp.description: Phase-Locked Loop (PLL) with VCO - Phase Comparator Section
PhaseComp.notes: Logical indices: I1(0),I2(1),O(2). Uses phase comparator portion

PisoShift.notes: Logical indices for 8-bit: LD(0),CLK(1),Q(2),SER(3 optional),D0-D7(4-11). Default bits=8

Potentiometer.notes: Logical indices: 0=Terminal_1, 1=Terminal_2, 2=Wiper. Not an IC - discrete resistive component

RelaySPDT.description: DPDT Signal Relay (using SPDT configuration - 1 pole)
RelaySPDT.notes: Logical indices: 0-1=Coil, 2-4=Switch (Common, NO, NC). Electromechanical relay - coil actuates switch

RingCounter.notes: Logical indices for default: CLK(0),R(1),Q0-Q9(2-11). Default bits=10

SCR.notes: Logical indices: 0=Anode, 1=Cathode, 2=Gate. 3-pin thyristor, TO-225AA package. Latches on when gate triggered. Also works: 2N5064, TYN612

SRAM.notes: Logical indices: WE(0),OE(1),A0-A14(2-16),D0-D7(17-24). Default 8 addr, 8 data bits

SeqGen.description: Simple Programmable Logic Device for Sequence Generation
SeqGen.notes: Logical indices: CLK(0),Q(1),R(2 optional). Custom programmed for sequences

SevenSeg.notes: Logical indices: a-g(0-6) segments. Common anode at pin 3,8

SevenSegDecoder.notes: Logical indices: a-g outputs(0-6),I3-I0 inputs(7-10),BI(11 optional)

SipoShift.notes: Logical indices for 8-bit: D(0),CLK(1),Q0-Q7(2-9). Default bits=8

Switch2Throw.notes: Logical indices: 0=Common, 1=Throw_1, 2=Throw_2. Variable throw count - default 2. Mechanical switch

TFlipFlop.description: Dual JK Flip-Flop configured as T Flip-Flop (using IC #1, J and K tied together)
TFlipFlop.notes: Logical indices: 0=T,1=Q,2=Q̄,3=CLK,4=R(optional),5=S(optional). T input connects to both J1 and K1

TappedTransformer.notes: Logical indices: 0-2=Primary (start, tap, end), 3-4=Secondary. Common for push-pull amplifiers

TimeDelayRelay.notes: Logical indices: Vin(0),Gnd(1),in(2),out(3). Simulates time delay relay

Transformer.description: Audio Transformer 1:1 ratio (600 ohm to 600 ohm)
Transformer.notes: Logical indices: 0-1=Primary, 2-3=Secondary. Magnetic component - not an IC. Provides isolation

TransistorNPN.notes: Logical indices: 0=Base, 1=Collector, 2=Emitter. Discrete 3-pin transistor, TO-92 package. Also works: BC547, 2N2222

TransistorPNP.notes: Logical indices: 0=Base, 1=Collector, 2=Emitter. Discrete 3-pin transistor, TO-92 package. Complementary to 2N3904. Also works: BC557, 2N2907

TransmissionLine.notes: Logical indices: 0=Input+, 1=Input-, 2=Output+, 3=Output-. 4-pin theoretical component for RF/high-speed signal modeling. Not a purchasable IC - represents physical traces/cables with characteristic impedance

TriStateBuffer.notes: Logical indices: 0=Input, 1=Output, 2=Enable (active low). Digital buffer with high-impedance output when disabled. DIP-14 package, using only first buffer

Triac.notes: Logical indices: 0=MT1 (Main Terminal 1), 1=MT2 (Main Terminal 2), 2=Gate. 3-pin AC switch, TO-220 package. Also works: MAC97A8, BTA16

Triode.notes: Logical indices: 0=Plate (Anode), 1=Grid, 2=Cathode. Vacuum tube with heater (not modeled in simulator). 9-pin miniature base. Also works: 12AU7, 12AT7, 6L6 (power triode)

UnijunctionReal.notes: Logical indices: 0=Emitter, 1=Base1, 2=Base2. Used for relaxation oscillators

VCCS.notes: Logical indices: A,B inputs(0,1 for 2 inputs),C+(2),C-(3). Default 2 inputs

VCO.description: Phase-Locked Loop with VCO - VCO Section

Wattmeter.notes: Logical indices: 0=V+, 1=V-, 2=I+, 3=I-. 4-pin measurement device. Not a component to build - represents measurement instrument. Measures voltage across pins 0-1 and current through pins 2-3

Xor Gate.notes: Logical indices: 0=Input_A, 1=Input_B, 2=Output. Variable input count in simulator (default 2). DIP-14 package, using only first gate. Same IC as HalfAdder

Seven Seg.notes: Logical indices: a-g(0-6) segments. Common anode at pin 3,8

J K Flip Flop.description: Dual JK Flip-Flop with Clear (using IC #1 only)
J K Flip Flop.notes: Logical indices: 0=J,1=CLK,2=K,3=Q,4=Q̄,5=R(optional). Maps to first flip-flop

Op Amp.description: General Purpose Op-Amp with internal transistor-level model
Op Amp.notes: Logical indices: 0=IN-, 1=IN+, 2=OUT, 3=V+, 4=V-. CompositeElm models 741 internal circuit

Transistor.notes: Logical indices: 0=Base, 1=Collector, 2=Emitter. Discrete 3-pin transistor, TO-92 package. Also works: BC547, 2N2222

Relay.description: DPDT Signal Relay (using SPDT configuration - 1 pole)
Relay.notes: Logical indices: 0-1=Coil, 2-4=Switch (Common, NO, NC). Electromechanical relay - coil actuates switch

Decimal Display.notes: Logical indices for 4-bit BCD: I0-I3(0-3). Displays 0-9 based on BCD input
